greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix logarithm of triangle A104980.
comment: Column 0 equals column 1 of triangular matrix A104980, which satisfies: SHIFT_LEFT(column 0 of A104980^p) = p*(column p+1 of A104980) for p>=0. Column 1 equals twice column 0.
mathematica: M = Table[If[n == k, 0, If[n == k+1, -n+1, -Coefficient[(1-1/Sum[i! x^i, {i, 0, n}])/x + O[x]^n, x, n-k-1]]], {n, 1, nmax+1}, {k, 1, nmax+1}];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 09 2018, from PARI *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 10 2005
